citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:45am on
27-Jun-19.
Inspector arrived at facility. Encountered licensee in driveway who was leaving and could not do an inspection at
that time.
